text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @realDonaldTrump Stop shaking everyone’s hands. You have been exposed to coronavirus. We need to change the way we greet each throughout the world. #nohandshake #nohandshakes #WakandaForever https://t.co/9unVikeGvq
